profile.title: Profile
profile.title-description: This information will be displayed publicly so be careful what you share.
profile.about-description: Write a few sentences about yourself.
profile.personal-description: Use a permanent address where you can receive mail.
profile.description-notification: We'll always let you know about important changes, but you pick what else you want to hear about.
profile.description-comment: Get notified when someones posts a comment on a posting.
profile.description-candidates: Get notified when a candidate applies for a job.
profile.description-offer: Get notified when a candidate accepts or rejects an offer.
profile.description-push: These are delivered via SMS to your mobile phone.

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.errorlogin: Authentication failed. Please check your email and password.

modalUser.title: Edit User
modalUser.description:
Are you sure you want to modify this account ? All your data will be permanently deleted.
This action cannot be undone.
